issue.title: [Rust] Add support to external release of un-owned buffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10149](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10149). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we can't release externally owned resources (for FFI).

The goal of this issue is to support such a release.
